title: Reactivate Service After Suspension
description: A customer who temporarily suspended their service has returned early from travel and wants to reactivate their line.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and confirm their account is currently under a vacation suspension.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the account and its suspended status.

tasks.description: Explain any prorated charges that will result from early reactivation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the billing implications.

tasks.description: Remove the suspension from the customer's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reactivates the service line.
